text: Egidio Caporello (8 June 1931 â€“ 18 July 2022) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1955. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Mantua, Italy, from 1986 until his retirement in 2007. Caporello was born in Padua, Italy. Caporello died on 18 July 2022 at his home in Mantua, Italy from pneumonia caused by Alzheimer's disease, aged 91.MONSIGNOR CAPORELLO, THE GENTILE BISHOP WHO LOVED DIALOGUE ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Egidio Caporello
